metadata.title: CVE-2021-35597 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Client product of Oracle MySQL (component: CAPI). Supported versions that are affected are 8.0.26 and prior. Easilyexploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with networkaccess via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Client. Successfulattacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause ahang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Client. CVSS3.1 Base Score 6.5 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.1: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
